resources.string: Play Pause Sensor controls the music state by hovering hand over the proximity sensor. It works only when the application is in the view.
Next Track Sensor changes the track with shake. It works even when the application is not in the view.
Music Visualizer draws music pattern in full player.
The app comes with built in equalizer. Disable system\'s equalizer for effective use.
You can fling left or right to change the track in full player.
It\'s Recommended to disable Next Track Sensor while running , cycling , etc.
EXPERIMENTAL:Songs are listed in "Soft" and "Hard" lists on the basis of data analysis at medium-high volume. Actual result may vary from the expected one.
